sentences.en: About one in six couples has difficulty conceiving.
sentences.cn: 大约1/6的夫妻有受孕困难。

sentences.en: Aron couldn't speak Polish. I made myself understood with difficulty.
sentences.cn: 阿伦不会说波兰语，我为了让他明白我的话很是费了一番力气。

sentences.en: Belinda was having difficulty bonding with the baby.
sentences.cn: 贝琳达难以与孩子建立起亲密的关系。

sentences.en: Companies are having difficulty in raising capital.
sentences.cn: 各公司融资困难。

sentences.en: Difficulties can arise when there is more than one defendant.
sentences.cn: 如果被告不止一个，可能就会产生难题。

sentences.en: He was going red in the face and breathing with difficulty.
sentences.cn: 他涨红了脸，费力地喘着气。

sentences.en: He's a real genius but he has difficulty verbalizing his ideas.
sentences.cn: 他确实是个天才，可是难以用语言表达他的思想。

sentences.en: I had some difficulty at first recalling why we were there.
sentences.cn: 刚开始回想我们为什么会在那儿时我有些费劲。

sentences.en: If you have any difficulties, give me a call.
sentences.cn: 如果你遇到困难，就给我打电话。

sentences.en: Many men still have difficulty accepting a woman as a business partner.
sentences.cn: 许多男性仍然无法接受女性商业伙伴。

sentences.en: Rumours spread about banks being in difficulty.
sentences.cn: 有传闻称银行现在处境艰难。

sentences.en: She soon got into difficulty with debt.
sentences.cn: 她很快就因债务陷入了困境。

sentences.en: Something gave me the strength to overcome the difficulty.
sentences.cn: 有些事给了我克服困难的勇气。

sentences.en: The detective-constable picked out the words with difficulty.
sentences.cn: 探警费力地辨认出这些文字。

sentences.en: The first difficulty is that, old-fashioned or not, it is very good.
sentences.cn: 首要的难题是，过时也好，不过时也罢，它很不错。

sentences.en: The injured man mounted his horse with difficulty.
sentences.cn: 受伤的男子艰难地上了马。

sentences.en: The tests vary in difficulty.
sentences.cn: 测试的难度有所不同。

sentences.en: They had great difficulty in finding a replacement.
sentences.cn: 他们找接替的人费了很大劲

sentences.en: They showed great perseverance in the face of difficulty.
sentences.cn: 他们面对困难表现了坚强的毅力。

sentences.en: Twins often have difficulty expressing themselves verbally.
sentences.cn: 双胞胎往往有言语表达方面的困难。

words.tran_cn: 困难的；不随和的；执拗的

phrases.tran_cn: 对…有困难；在某方面有困难
与…有分歧，相处不好；感到困难

trans.tran_en: if you have difficulty doing something, it is difficult for you to do
if you have difficulty doing something, it is difficult for you to do
